.. _fluidtypo3-vhs-site-url:

====================================
site.url ViewHelper `<vhs:site.url>`
====================================


Site: URL
=========

Returns the website URL as returned by
`\TYPO3\CMS\Core\Utility\GeneralUtility::getIndpEnv('TYPO3_SITE_URL')`


.. _fluidtypo3-vhs-site-url_arguments:

Arguments
=========


This ViewHelper has no arguments.
